oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: National Barn Dance - WLS performances - 1941-12-27
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Home recorded National Barn Dance performances, featuring Otto and His Novelodeons, Prairie Ramblers, Doc Hopkins, Chick Hurt, and Jimmy James on December 27, 1941 on radio station WLS (Chicago, IL).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Otto and His Novelodeons; Prairie Ramblers; Doc Hopkins; Chick Hurt; Jimmy James
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Louisiana Lullaby ([Unidentified]) -- Jack Stilwell talks -- Jack Stilwell advertises Lava soap -- [Unidentified square dance tune] (Otto And His Novelodeons) -- Jack Stilwell introduces Prairie Ramblers -- Saddle The Moon (Prairie Ramblers) -- Jack Stilwell introduces Doc Hopkins -- The Train That Never Returned (Doc Hopkins) -- Jack Stilwell talks -- Jack Stilwell introduces Chick Hurt and Jimmy James -- At A Georgia Camp Meeting (Chick Hurt & Jimmy James) -- Jack Stilwell talks (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Barn Dance (Radio program); WLS (Radio station : Chicago, Ill.); Otto And His Novelodeons (Musical group); Prairie Ramblers; Hopkins, Doc, 1900-1988; Hurt, Chick, 1905-1967; James, Jimmy, 1912-2004;
